data.title: Product Support - QoreStor
data.meta_description: Support information to install, trouble shoot and maintain your Quest product
data.text:
Our technical support staff has identified the following critical information to get you started. To get the best results make sure you read through all material prior to using your Quest Product.

Please see the QoreStor Administration: Module 3 – Users, Storage Groups and ContainersThis course teaches how to create and edit users for different functions within QoreStor, how to create Storage Groups and their limitations, how to enable encryption on a Storage Group, and how to create containers for the different access protocols.This course is offered as self-paced web-based training with s...

Antivirius software can cause files or disable processes in the Qorestor server and corresponding repositories to be quarantined causing a QoreStor system to go offline, into maintenance mode and initiate a filesystem scan in which there will be data-loss.

The Cleaner is not workingSpace is not being reclaimedNot enough space is being reclaimedThe performance is slower than expectedThe system uses more resources than expected

How to configure QoreStor tiering for WASABI S3?

Migrating RDA containers (RDS containers for Netvault and vRanger) from DR Series appliance to QoreStor installation in bulk can take time.

Samba released a security announcement about a vulnerability in the vfs_fruit module that could allow unauthorized access. https://www.samba.org/samba/security/CVE-2021-44142.html

Please see QoreStor Administration: Module 7 – RapidCIFS/NFS - Web-based TrainingThis course teaches how to create NAS containers for use with the RapidCIFS and NFS protocols, installing the RapidCIFS and NFS plugins, as well as best practices.This course is offered as self-paced web-based training with simulated lab exercises.This course has the following objectives:What is RapidCIFS/NFS?Supporte...

Please see QoreStor Administration: Module 4 – Management - Web-based TrainingThis course teaches how to manage the QoreStor system through the GUI and CLI including how to run and schedule the cleaner, connect to Global View Cloud and viewing Dashboard statistics, alerts and events.This course is offered as self-paced web-based training with simulated lab exercises.This course has the following o...

Please see QoreStor Administration: Module 5 – RDA with NetVault Backup and vRanger - Web-based TrainingThis course teaches how to create RDS containers and how to connect them for use for backup and replication with NetVault Backup and vRanger, as well as covering some general best practices.This course is offered as self-paced web-based training with simulated lab exercises.This course has the f...

Please see QoreStor Administration: Module 6 - OST - Web-based TrainingThis course teaches how to create OST containers and attach QoreStor to Veritas’ Backup Exec and NetBackup products, as well as covering some general best practices.This course is offered as self-paced web-based training with simulated lab exercises.This course has the following objectives:Creating OST containersInstalling OST ...

The information below represents the most common issues customers are encountering or recent resolutions to help you trouble shoot your Quest Product.

Backup Exec cannot connect to CIFS container and shows the following message"The path appears to be an invalid path. Please ensure the server name and share name are correct."

Containers aren't reachable and CLI command system --show reports the following statusSystem State : Maintenance ModeReason : Found inconsistencies, waiting for user input.

“XFS: possible memory allocation deadlock in kmem_alloc” showing as error message in the OS.

Unable to install OST plugin on Backup Exec 21

When trying to map a network drive it fails with: "The mapped network drive could not be created because the following error has occurred: The specified network name is no longer available."

Unable to authenticate DR Administrator (or local) accounts when connecting to a CIFS or NFS shared container.When connecting to a share using the DR local administrator account, authentication may fail with the error "The user name or password is incorrect.", even though the correct user name and password is been used.If QoreStor has joined a domain, a domain level account will be able ...

Setting up a replication with QoreStor as source and a DR Series system as target returns the following error

In the main dashboard the graphs are not loading properly.May get one or more of the following errors:Memory Usage Chart Cannot retrieve memory usage dataMemory Real Usage Chart Cannot retrieve memory real usage dataDisk Repository Capacity Chart Cannot retrieve disk repository capacity dataDisk Meta Capacity Chart Cannot retrieve disk meta capacity dataRDA Connections Chart Cannot retrieve RDA co...

During installation of Qorestor the following error occurs:Supported Kernel Versions: 3.10.0-514 3.10.0-693 3.10.0-862Found Kernel: 3.10.0-957Kernel Test: FAILED

When trying to configure repllication the following error shows up as the finish button is clicked:"Error: <qorestore-name> does not have an ip address."We know the IP address is good as the WebUI is reachable and responsive, and backups can run.
